text: ya nisa' alnby -mhmd- lstnn fi alfadl walmnzlt kghyrknn min alnsa', 'iina emltn btaet allah wabtedtn ean measyh, fala tthdthn mae al'ajanib bisawt layin yutme aladhi fi qalbih fjwr wmrd fi alshhwt alhram, whdha adb wajib ealaa kl aimra'at tuamin biallah walyawm alakhr, wquln qawlana beydana ean alrybt, la tnkrh alshryet
